xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/plus_description=The Picture Licensing Universal System (PLUS) is an integrated system of standards designed to simplify and facilitate image licensing.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/plus_label=PLUS Standard Properties

xmp_property.name: ImageSupplier
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplier_description=Enter the identifier for the most recent supplier of this image - note that this might not be the creator or owner of the image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplier_label=Image Supplier

xmp_property.name: ImageSupplierImageID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierImageID_description=Optional identifier assigned by the Image Supplier to the image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierImageID_label=Supplier's Image ID

xmp_property.name: Version
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/Version_description=The version number of the PLUS standards in place at the time of the transaction
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/Version_label=PLUS Version

xmp_property.name: CopyrightOwner
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/CopyrightOwner_description=Enter the owner or owners of the copyright in the licensed image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/CopyrightOwner_label=Copyright Owner

xmp_property.name: ImageCreator
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageCreator_description=Enter the creator or creators of this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageCreator_label=Image Creator

xmp_property.name: Licensor
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/Licensor_description=Enter the person or company that should be contacted for obtaining a license for this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/Licensor_label=Licensor

xmp_property.name: MinorModelAgeDisclosure
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/MinorModelAgeDisclosure_description=Enter the age of the youngest model pictured in this image, at the time that this image was made
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/MinorModelAgeDisclosure_label=Minor Model Age Disclosure

xmp_property.name: ModelReleaseID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ModelReleaseID_description=Enter an identifier for each Model Release
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ModelReleaseID_label=Model Release Identifier

xmp_property.name: ModelReleaseStatus
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ModelReleaseStatus_description=Select one of the values for summarising the availability and scope of model releases authorising usage of the likenesses of persons appearing in the photograph
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ModelReleaseStatus_label=Model Release Status

xmp_property.name: PropertyReleaseID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/PropertyReleaseID_description=Enter an identifier for each Property Release
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/PropertyReleaseID_label=Property Release Identifier

xmp_property.name: PropertyReleaseStatus
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/plus/PropertyReleaseStatus_description=Select one of the values for summarising the availability and scope of property releases authorising usage of the properties appearing in the photograph
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/plus/PropertyReleaseStatus_label=Property Release Status

xmp_type.name: ImageSupplierDetail
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierDetail_label=Image Supplier Detail
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierDetail_description=Contains properties that provide for an Image Supplier

xmp_field.name: ImageSupplierName
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierName_label=Image Supplier Name
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageSupplierName_description=Name for the most recent supplier of this image - note that this might not be the creator or owner of the image

xmp_type.name: CopyrightOwnerDetail
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/plus/CopyrightOwnerDetail_label=Copyright Owner Detail
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/plus/CopyrightOwnerDetail_description=Contains properties that provide for a Copyright Owner

xmp_type.name: ImageCreatorDetail
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageCreatorDetail_label=Image Creator Detail
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/plus/ImageCreatorDetail_description=Contains properties that provide for an Image Creator

xmp_type.name: LicensorDetail
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/plus/LicensorDetail_label=Licensor Detail
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/plus/LicensorDetail_description=Contains properties that provide for a Licensor
